ch0101_42_mei/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Ready to head
to school?
ch0101_42_mei/7101_0701_01_10:
I always feel like eating something sweet after
studying!
ch0101_42_mei/7101_0701_02_10: Oh, I know! Wanna go to a café after this?
ch0101_42_mei/7101_0701_03_10: We can work on assignments and eat sweets!
ch0101_42_mei/7105_0701_01_10:
Director Clavell talked about finding something
we’d always treasure.
ch0101_42_mei/7105_0701_02_10:
Have you found anything like that yet,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0101_42_mei/7105_0701_03_10:
I’ve been thinking about it, but I still haven’t found
anything.
ch0101_42_mei/7105_0701_04_10:
So many things are important to me, I don’t know
which is my “treasure”!
ch0101_42_mei/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I thought I’d share a little cheer with you!
ch0101_42_mei/1701_0702_01_10: Let’s work hard on our studies together, OK?
ch0101_42_mei/2501_0701_01_10: I’ve been REALLY looking forward to school!
ch0101_42_mei/2501_0701_02_10:
Learning the same things in the same room as
everyone—and chatting together after class...
ch0101_42_mei/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve never been there myself, but there’s an
amazing school in Unova!
ch0101_42_mei/2501_0702_03_10:
It’s got its own Elite Four! I wonder if I could go
there and check it out, even just for a short while!
ch0101_42_mei/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Let’s make sure we put today to
good use!
ch0101_42_mei/3003_0701_01_10:
Oh man, I’m itching to get out there and battle!
So, when are we going? Now?
ch0101_42_mei/3005_0701_01_10:
Whoa, look at the time! We should go to sleep
soon so we’re not tired tomorrow!
